name: Gumi
text: Waɗancan ãyõyin Littãfi ne bayyananne.

name: Gumi
text: Tsammãninka kai mai halakar da ranka ne, dõmin ba su kasance mũminai ba!

name: Gumi
text: Idan Mun so zã Mu saukar, a kansu, da wata ãyã daga sama, sai wuyõyinsu su yini sabõda ita sunã mãsu ƙasƙantar da kai.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma wata tunãtarwa ba ta jẽ musu ba, daga Mai rahama, sãbuwa, fãce sun kasance daga barinta sunã mãsu bijirẽwa.

name: Gumi
text: To, lalle ne, sun ƙaryata, to, lãbãran abin da suka kasance sunã yi na izgili da shi zã ya je musu.

name: Gumi
text: Shin, ba su dũba ba zuwa ga ƙasa, da yawa Muka tsirar a cikinta, daga dukan nau'i mai kyau?

name: Gumi
text: Lalle ne, a cikin wancan akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu ba su kasance mũminai ba.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle ne, Ubangijinka, haƙĩƙa, Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai rahama.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma a lõkacin da Ubangijinka Ya kirãyi Mũsã, "Ka je wa mutãnen nan azzãlumai.

name: Gumi
text: "Mutãnen Fir'auna bã zã su yi taƙawa ba?"

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Ya Ubangijĩna, nĩ inã tsõron su ƙaryata ni.

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma ƙirjĩna ya yi ƙunci kuma harshẽna bã zai saku ba sabõda haka ka aika zuwa ga Harũna.

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma sunã da wani laifi a kaina, sabõda haka inã tsõron kada su kashe ni."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Kayya! Ku tafi, kũ biyu, da ÃyõyinMu. Lalle ne, Munã tãre da ku Munã Mãsu saurãre."

name: Gumi
text: "Sai ku je wa Fir'auna, sa'an nan ku ce, Lalle ne, mu, Manzannin Ubangijin halitta ne."

name: Gumi
text: "Ka saki Banĩ Isrã'ila tãre da mu."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Shin, ba mu yi rẽnonka ba a cikinmu kanã jãrĩri, kuma ka zauna a cikinmu shẽkarudaga lõkacin rãyuwarka?"

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma ka aikata aikinka wanda ka aikata alhãli kai kanã daga butulai?"

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Na aikata shi a lõkacin inã daga mãsu jãhilcin hushi."

name: Gumi
text: "Sabõda haka na gudu daga gãre ku a lõkacin da na ji tsõronku, sai Ubangijĩna Ya bã ni hukunci, kuma Ya sanya ni daga Manzanni."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma waccan ni'ima ce, kanã gõrint a kaina, dõmin kã bautar da Banĩ Isrã'ĩla."

name: Gumi
text: Fir'auna ya ce: "Kuma mene ne Ubangijin halittu?"

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Ubangijin sammai da ƙasa da abin da yake a tsakãninsu, idan kun kasance mãsu ƙarfin ĩmãni."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce wa waɗanda suke a gẽfensa, "Bã za ku saurãra ba?"

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Ubangijinku, kuma Ubangijin ubanninku na farko."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Lalle ne Manzonku, wanda aka aiko zuwa gare ku, haƙi ƙa, mahaukaci ne."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Ubangijin mafitar rãnã da maɓũyarta da abin dayake a tsakaninsu, idan kun kasance kunã hankalta."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Lalle ne idan ka riƙi wani abin bautãwa wanĩna haƙĩƙa, inã sanyã ka daga ɗaurarru."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Ashe, kuma kõ dã nã zõ maka da wani, abu mai bayyanãwa?"

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "To, ka zõ da shi idan ka kasance daga, mãsu gaskiya."

name: Gumi
text: Sai ya jẽfa sandarsa, sai ga ta kumurci bayyananne.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma ya fizge hannunsa, sai ga shi fari ga mãsu kallo.

name: Gumi
text: (Fir'auna) ya ce ga mashãwarta a gẽfensa, "Lalle ne, wannan haƙĩƙa, masihirci ne, mai ilmi!

name: Gumi
text: "Yanã son ya fitar da ku daga ƙasarku game da sihirinSa. To mẽne ne kuke shãwartãwa?"

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Ka jinkirtar da shi, shĩ da ɗan'uwansa, kuma ka aika mãsu gayya a cikin birãne."

name: Gumi
text: "Zã su zõ maka da dukkan mai yawan sihiri masani."

name: Gumi
text: Sai aka tãra masihirta dõmin ajalin yini sananne.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma aka ce wa mutãne "Kõ kũ mãsu tãruwã ne?

name: Gumi
text: "Tsammãninmu mu bi masihirta, idan sun kasance sũ ne marinjãya."

name: Gumi
text: To, a lõkacin da masihirta suka jẽ suka ce wa Fir'auna,"Shin, lalle ne, haƙĩƙa munã da ijãra idan mun kasance mũ ne marinjãya?"

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Na'am! Kuma lalle ne, kũ ne a lõkacin haƙĩƙa muƙarrabai."

name: Gumi
text: Mũsã ya ce musu, "Ku jẽfa abin da kuke mãsu jẽfãwa."

name: Gumi
text: Sai suka jẽfa igiyõyinsu, da sandunansu, kuma suka ce: "Da ƙarfin Fir'auna lalle ne mũ, haƙĩƙa, mũ ne marinjãya."

name: Gumi
text: Sai Mũsa ya jẽfa sandarsa, sai ga ta tanã harhaɗe abin da suke yi na ƙarya.

name: Gumi
text: Sai aka jẽfar da masihirta sunã mãsu sujada.

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Mun yi ĩmãni da Ubangijin halitta."

name: Gumi
text: "Ubangijin Mũsa da Hãrũna."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Ashe, kun yi ĩmãni sabõda shĩ, a gabãnin in yi muku izni? Lalle ne shi, haƙĩƙa babbanku ne wanda ya kõya muku sihirin, to, zã ku sani. Lalle ne haƙĩƙa, zan kakkãtse hannuwanku da kafãfunku a tarnaƙi, kuma haƙĩƙa, zan tsĩrẽ ku gabã ɗaya."

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Bãbu wata cũta! Lalle ne mũ mãsu jũyãwa ne zuwa ga Ubangijinmu."

name: Gumi
text: "Lalle ne mu munã kwaɗayin Ubangijinmu, Ya gãfarta mana kurakuranmu dõmin mun kasance farkon mãsu ĩmãni."

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka aika zuwa ga Mũsã cẽwa ka yi tafiyar dare da bãyiNa, lalle ne kũ waɗanda ake biyã ne.

name: Gumi
text: Sai Fir'auna ya aika mãsu gayya a cikin birãne.

name: Gumi
text: "Lalle ne, waɗannan, haƙĩƙa, ƙungiya ce kaɗan."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma lalle ne sũ, a gare Mu, Mãsu fusãtarwa ne."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma lalle ne mũ haƙĩƙa gabã ɗaya mãsu sauna ne."

name: Gumi
text: Sai Muka fitar da su daga gonaki da marẽmari.

name: Gumi
text: Da taskõki da mazauni mai kyau.

name: Gumi
text: Kamar haka! Kuma Muka gãdar da su ga Banĩ Isrãĩla.

name: Gumi
text: Sai suka bĩ su sunã mãsu fita a lõkacin hũdõwar rãnã.

name: Gumi
text: Sa'an nan a lõkacin da jama'a biyu suka ga jũna, sai abõkan Mũsã suka ce: "Lalle ne mũ haƙĩ ƙa, waɗanda ake riska ne."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Kayya! Lalle ne Ubangijina Yanã tare da ni, zai shiryar da ni."

name: Gumi
text: Sai Muka yi wahayi zuwa ga Mũsã cẽwa "Ka dõki tẽku da sandarka." Sai tẽku ta tsãge, kõwane tsãgi ya kasance kamar falalen dũtse mai girma.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka kusantar da waɗansu mutãne a can.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka tsĩrar da Mũsã da waɗanda suke tãre da shi gabã ɗaya.

name: Gumi
text: Sa'an nan kuma Muka nutsar da waɗansu mutãnen.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle ne a cikin wannan akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu ba su kasance mãsu ĩmãni ba.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle ne Ubangijinka, kaƙĩƙa, Shĩ ne Mabũwayi, Mai jin ƙai.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma ka karanta, a kansu, lãbãrin Ibrãhĩm.

name: Gumi
text: A sã'ilin da ya ce wa ubansa da mutãnensa, "Mẽne ne kuke bauta wa?"

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Munã bauta wa gumãka, sabõda haka munã yini mãsu lazimta a gare su."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Shin, sunã jin ku, a lõkacin da kuke kira?"

name: Gumi
text: "Kõ kuwa sunã amfãnin ku, kõ sunã cũtar ku?"

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Ã'a mun sãmĩ ubanninmu, kamar haka ne suke aikatãwa."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Shin to, kun ga abin da kuka kasance kunã bautã wa?"

name: Gumi
text: "Kũ da ubanninku mafi daɗẽwa?"

name: Gumi
text: "To lalle ne, sũ maƙiya ne a gare ni, fãce Ubangijin halittu."

name: Gumi
text: "Wanda Ya halitta ni, sa'an nan Yanã shiryar da ni."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma Wanda Yake Shĩ ne Yake ciyar da ni, kuma Yanã shãyar da ni."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma idan na yi jiyya, to, Shĩ ne Yake warkar da ni."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma wanda Yake matar da ni, sa'an nan Ya rãyar da ni."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma wanda Yake inã kwaɗayin Ya gãfarta mini kurãkuraina, a rãnar sãkamako."

name: Gumi
text: "Ya Ubangijĩna! Ka ba ni hukunci, kuma Ka riskar da ni ga sãlihai."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma Ka sanya mini harshen gaskiya a cikin mutãnen ƙarshe."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma Ka sanya ni daga magãdan Aljannar ni'ima."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma Ka gãfarta wa ubãna, lalle ne shi, ya kasance daga ɓatattu."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma kada Ka kunyata ni a rãnar da ake tãyar da su."

name: Gumi
text: "A rãnar da dũkiya bã ta amfãni, kuma ɗiya bã su yi."

name: Gumi
text: "Fãce wanda ya jẽ wa Allah da zũciya mai tsarki."

name: Gumi
text: Kuma aka kusantar da Aljanna ga mãsu taƙawa.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma aka fitar da wutã babba dõmin halakakku.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma aka ce musu, "Inã abin da kuka kasance kunã bautawa?"

name: Gumi
text: "Baicin Allah? Shin sunã tamakon ku kõ kuwa sunã tsare kansu?"

name: Gumi
text: Sai aka kikkife su a cikinta, su da halakakkun.

name: Gumi
text: Da rundunar Ibilĩsa gabã ɗaya.

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: alhãli sunã a cikinta sunã yin husũma,

name: Gumi
text: "Rantsuwa da Allah! Lalle ne mun kasance, haƙĩƙa, a cikin ɓata bayyananna."

name: Gumi
text: "A lõkacin da muke daidaita ku da Ubangijin halittu.

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma bãbu abin da ya ɓatar da mu fãce mãsu laifi."

name: Gumi
text: "Sabõda haka bã mu da waɗansu macẽta."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma bã mu da abõki, masõyi."

name: Gumi
text: "Sabõda haka dã lalle munã da (dãmar) kõmawa, dõmin mu kasance daga mũminai!"

name: Gumi
text: Lalle ne, a cikin wancan akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu, bã su kasance mũminai ba.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle ne, Ubangijinka, Shi ne Mabuwãyi, Mai jin ƙai.

name: Gumi
text: Mutãnen Nũhu sun ƙaryata Manzanni.

name: Gumi
text: A lõkacin da ɗan'uwansu, Nũhu, ya ce musu, "Shin, bã zã ku yi taƙawa ba?"

name: Gumi
text: "Lalle ne, zuwa gare ku, ni Manzo ne amintacce."

name: Gumi
text: "To, ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma bã ni tambayar ku wata ijãra a kansa. Ijãrãtã ba ta zama ba fãce daga Ubangijin halittu."

name: Gumi
text: "Sabõda haka, ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Ashe, zã mu yi ĩmãni sabõda kai alhãli kuwa mafiya ƙasƙanci sun bi ka?"

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Kuma bã ni da sani ga abin da suka kasance sanã aikatãwa."

name: Gumi
text: "Hisãbinsu bai zama ba fãce ga Ubangijina, dã kunã sansancẽwa."

name: Gumi
text: "Ban zama mai kõre mũminai ba."

name: Gumi
text: "Nĩ ba kõwa ba ne sai mai gargaɗi mai bayyanãwa."

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Lalle ne, idan ba ka hanu ba, yã Nũhu, (daga maganarka,) haƙĩƙa, kanã kasancẽwa daga waɗanda ake jẽfewa"

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Yã Ubangijĩna! Lalle ne mutãnena sun ƙaryatã ni."

name: Gumi
text: "Sai ka yi hukunci, a tsakãnĩna da tsakãninsu tabbataccen hukanci, kuma ka tsĩrar da ni, da waɗanda suke tãre da ni daga mũminai."

name: Gumi
text: Sai Muka tsĩrar da shi, shi da waɗanda suke tãre da shi, a cikin jirgi wanda aka yi wa lõdi.

name: Gumi
text: Sa'an nan Muka nutsar a bãyan haka, da sauran.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle ne a cikin wannan akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu, ba su kasance mãsu ĩmãni ba.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Lalle ne, Ubangijinka, haƙĩƙa, Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai Rahama.

name: Gumi
text: Ãdãwa sun ƙaryata Manzanni.

name: Gumi
text: A lõkacin da ɗan'uwansu, Hũdu ya ce musu, "Bã zã ku yi taƙawa ba?"

name: Gumi
text: "Lalle ne ni, zuwa gare ku, haƙĩƙa, Manzo ne, amintacce."

name: Gumi
text: "Sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma bã ni tambayar wata ijãra a kansa. Ijãrãta ba ta zama ba, fãce daga Ubangijin halittu."

name: Gumi
text: "Shin, kunã yin ginin sitadiyo a kõwane tsauni ne, kunã yin wãsa?"

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma kunã riƙon matsãrar ruwa, tsammãninku, ku dawwama?"

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma idan kun yi damƙa, sai ku yi damƙar kunã mãsu tanƙwasãwa."

name: Gumi
text: "To ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

name: Gumi
text: "Ku ji tsõron wanda Ya taimake ku da abin da kuka sani."

name: Gumi
text: "Ya taimake ku da dabbõbin ni'ima da ɗiya."

name: Gumi
text: "Da gõnaki da marẽmari."

name: Gumi
text: "Lalle ne nĩ, inã ji muku tsõron azãbar wani yini mai girma."

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Daidai ne a kanmu: Kã yi wa'azi kõ ba ka kasance daga mãsu wa'azi ba."

name: Gumi
text: "Wannan abu bai zamõ ba fãce hãlãyen mutãnen farko."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma mũ ba mu zama waɗanda ake yi wa azãba ba."

name: Gumi
text: Sabõda haka suka ƙaryata shi, sai Muka halakar da sũ. Lalle ne a cikin wannan akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu ba su kasance mãsu ĩmãni ba.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle ne, Ubangijinka, haƙĩƙa, Shi ne Mabuwãyi, Mai jin ƙai.

name: Gumi
text: Samũdãwa sun ƙaryata Manzanni.

name: Gumi
text: A lõkacin da ɗan'uwansu Sãlihu ya ce: "Shin, bã zã ku bi Allah da taƙawa ba?"

name: Gumi
text: "Lalle ne nĩ zuwã gare ku, Manzo ne, amintacce."

name: Gumi
text: "Sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã.

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma bã ni tambayar ku wata ijãra a kansa. Ijãrãta ba ta zama ba fãce da a Ubangijin halittu."

name: Gumi
text: "Shin, anã barin ku a cikin abin da yake a nan, kunã amintattu?"

name: Gumi
text: "A cikin gõnaki da marẽmari."

name: Gumi
text: "Da shuke-shuke da dabĩ nai, 'ya'yan itãcensu hirtsi mãsu narkẽwa a ciki?"

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma kunã sassaƙa gidãje daga duwãtsu, kunã mãsu alfãhari?"

name: Gumi
text: "Sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

name: Gumi
text: "Kada ku yi ɗã'ã ga umurnin maɓarnata."

name: Gumi
text: "Waɗanda suke yin ɓarna a cikin ƙasa, kuma bã su kyautatãwa."

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Kai daga mãsu sihiri kurum kake."

name: Gumi
text: "Bã kõwa kake ba, fãce mutum kamarmu. To, kã zo da wata ãyã idan kã kasance daga mãsu gaskiya."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Wannan rãkuma ce tanã da shan yini, kuma kunã da shan yini sasanne."

name: Gumi
text: "Kada ku shãfe ta da cũta har azãbar yini mai girmã ta shãfe ku."

name: Gumi
text: Sai suka sõke ta sa'an nan suka wãyi gari sunã mãsu nadãma.

name: Gumi
text: Sabõda haka azãba ta kãma su. Lalle ne a cikin wannan akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu, ba su kasance mãsu ĩmãni ba.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle ne Ubangijinka, haƙĩ ƙa, Shĩ ne Mabuwayi, Mai jin ƙai.

name: Gumi
text: Mutãnen Lũɗu sun ƙaryata Manzanni.

name: Gumi
text: A lõkacin da ɗan'uwansu, Lũɗu ya ce musu, "Bã zã ku yi taƙawa ba?"

name: Gumi
text: "Lalle ne nĩ, zuwa gare ku, Manzõ ne, amintacce."

name: Gumi
text: "Sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma bã ni tambayar ku wata ijãra, Ijãrãta ba ta zama ba fãce daga Ubangijin halittu."

name: Gumi
text: "Shin kunã jẽ wa maza daga cikin talikai?"

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma kunã barin abin da Ubangijinku Ya halitta muku daga mãtanku? Ã'a, ku mutãne ne mãsu ƙẽtarẽwa!"

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Lalle ne haƙĩƙa idan ba ka hanu ba, yã Lũɗu! Tĩlas ne kanã kasancẽwa daga waɗanda ake fitarwa (daga gari)."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Lalle ne ga aikinku, haƙĩƙa, inã daga mãsu ƙinsa."

name: Gumi
text: "Ya Ubangijina! Ka tsĩrar da ni da iyãlĩna daga abin da suke aikatãwa."

name: Gumi
text: Sabõda haka Muka tsĩrar da shi, Shi da mutãnensa gabã ɗaya.

name: Gumi
text: Fãce wata tsõhuwa a cikin mãsu wanzuwa.

name: Gumi
text: Sa'an nan kuma Muka darkãke wasu.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Muka yi ruwan sama a kansu ruwa, sai dai ruwan waɗanda ake yi wa gargaɗi ya mũnana.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle ne ga wannan, akwai ãyã, kuma mafi yawansu bã su kasance mãsu ĩmãni ba.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle ne Ubangijinka, haƙĩƙa, Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai jin ƙai.

name: Gumi
text: Ma'abũta ƙunci sun ƙaryata Manzanni.

name: Gumi
text: A lõkacin da Shu'aibu ya ce musu, "Bã zã ku yi taƙawa ba?"

name: Gumi
text: "Lalle ne ni, zuwa gare ku, Manzo ne, amintacce."

name: Gumi
text: "Sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa kuma ku yi mini ɗã'ã."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma ba ni tambayar ku wata ijãra a kansa. Ijãrata ba ta zama ba fãce daga Ubangijin halittu."

name: Gumi
text: "Ku cika mũdu, kuma kada ku kasance daga mãsu sanyãwar hasãra (ga mutãne)."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma ku yi awo da sikẽli daidaitacce."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma kada ku nakasa wa mutãne abũbuwansu kuma kada ku yi fasãdi a cikin ƙasa kuna mãsu ɓarna."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma ku ji tsõron Allah wanda Ya halitta ku, kũ da jama'ar farko."

name: Gumi
text: Suka ce: "Kai dai daga waɗanda suke sihirtattu kawai ne."

name: Gumi
text: "Kuma bã kõwa kake ba, fãce mutum kamarmu kuma lalle ne munã zaton ka, haƙĩƙa, daga maƙaryata."

name: Gumi
text: "To ka jẽfo wani ɓaɓɓake daga sama a kanmu, idan ka kasance daga mãsu gaskiya."

name: Gumi
text: Ya ce: "Ubangijĩna ne Mafi sani ga abin da kuke aikatãwa."

name: Gumi
text: Sai suka ƙaiyatã shi, sabõda haka, azãbar rãnar girgije ta kãma su. Lalle ne ita, tã kasance azãbar yini mai girma.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle a cikin wancan haƙĩka akwai ãya, amma mafi yawansu ba su kasance mãsu ĩmãni ba.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle Ubangijĩnka, haƙĩƙa, Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai jin ƙai.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle shi (Alƙur'ãni), haƙĩƙa, saukarwar Ubangijinhalittu ne.

name: Gumi
text: Rũhi amintacce ne ya sauka da shi.

name: Gumi
text: A kan zũciyarka, dõmin ka kasance daga mãsu gargaɗi.

name: Gumi
text: Da harshe na Larabci mai bayãni.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle shin, haƙĩƙa, yanã a cikin litattafan (Manzannin) farko.

name: Gumi
text: Ashe, bai kasance ãyã ba a gare su, ya zama Mãlaman Banĩ Isrã'ĩla sun san shi?

name: Gumi
text: Kuma dã mun saukar da shi a kan sãshen Ajamãwa,

name: Gumi
text: Ya karanta shi a kansu, ba su kasance sabõda shi mãsu ĩmãni ba.

name: Gumi
text: Kamar wancan ne! Muka shigar da shi a cikin zukãtan mãsu laifi.

name: Gumi
text: Bã zã su yi ĩmãni da shĩ ba sai sun ga azãbar nan mai raɗadi.

name: Gumi
text: Sai ta taho musu kwatsam, alhãli kuwa sũ, ba su sansance ba.

name: Gumi
text: Sai su ce: "Shin, mu waɗanda ake yi wa jinkiri ne?"

name: Gumi
text: Ashe, to, da azãbarMu suke nẽman gaggãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Ashe, to, kã gani, idan Muka jĩshe su daɗi a shẽkaru,

name: Gumi
text: Sa'an nan abin da suka kasance anã yi musu wa'adi (da shi) ya jẽ musu,

name: Gumi
text: Abin da suka kasance anã jĩshe su dãɗin bã zai tunkuɗe azãba ba daga gare su.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma bã Mu halakar da wata alƙarya ba fãce tanã da mãsu gargaɗi.

name: Gumi
text: Dõmin tunãtarwa, kuma ba Mu kasance Mãsu zãlunci ba.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma (Alƙur'ãni) Shaiɗãnu ba su ɗõra sauka da shĩba.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma bã ya kamãta a gare su (su Shaiɗãnu su sauka da shi), kuma ba su iyãwa.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle ne sũ, daga saurãre, haƙĩƙa, waɗanda aka nĩsantar ne.

name: Gumi
text: Sabõda haka, kada ka kira wani abin bautãwa na dabam tãre da Allah, sai ka kasance daga waɗanda ake yi wa azãba.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma ka yi gargaɗi ga danginka mafiya kusanci.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma ka sassauta fikãfikanka ga wanda ya bĩ ka daga mũminai.

name: Gumi
text: Sa'an nan idan suka sãɓã maka to ka ce: "Lalle nĩ, barrantacce ne daga abin da kuko aikatãwa."

name: Gumi
text: Kuma ka dõgara ga Mabuwãyi, Mai jin ƙai.

name: Gumi
text: Wanda Yake ganin ka a lõkacin da kake tãshi tsaye.

name: Gumi
text: Da jujjuyãwarka a cikin mãsu yin sujada.

name: Gumi
text: Lalle Shi, Shi ne Mai ji, Masani.

name: Gumi
text: Shin, (kunã so) in gaya muku a kan wanda Shaiɗãnnu kan sauka?

name: Gumi
text: Sukan sauka a kan dukkan maƙaryaci, mai zunubi.

name: Gumi
text: Sunã jẽfa (abin da suka) ji, alhãli kuwa mafi yawansu maƙaryata ne.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma mawãƙa halakakku ne ke bin su.

name: Gumi
text: Shin, ba ku cẽwa, lalle ne sũ, cikin kõwane rango sunã yin ɗimuwa (su ƙẽtare haddi) ba?

name: Gumi
text: Kuma lalle ne, sũ, sunã faɗin abin da bã su aikatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Fãce waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, kuma suka ambaci Allah da yawa, kuma suka rãma zãlunci, daga bãyan an zãlunce su. Kuma waɗanda suka yi zãlunci, zã su sani a wace majũya suke jũyãwa.
